content_matching_logins_title.description: Title for the section displaying login items that match the current context

content_save_prompt_add_header.message: Do you want to add this Item to 2FAS Pass?
content_save_prompt_add_header.description: Header asking if the user wants to save a new login item

content_save_prompt_update_header.message: Do you want to save the changes done to this Item?
content_save_prompt_update_header.description: Header asking if the user wants to update an existing login item

content_save_prompt_don_t_ask.description: Option to prevent the save prompt from appearing in the future

content_save_prompt_add_login.description: Button label to add a new login item to 2FAS Pass

content_save_prompt_update_login.description: Button label to update an existing login item in 2FAS Pass

autofill_cross_domain_warning.message: This form is on a different domain (CURRENT_DOMAIN) than the main page (TOP_DOMAIN). Do you want to continue with autofill?
autofill_cross_domain_warning.description: Warning shown when autofill is attempted on a cross-domain iframe

autofill_cross_domain_warning_no_access.message: This form is on CURRENT_DOMAIN which appears to be in a cross-domain iframe. Do you want to continue with autofill?
autofill_cross_domain_warning_no_access.description: Warning shown when autofill is attempted on a cross-domain iframe and we cannot access the parent domain

content_cross_domain_dialog_title.description: Title for the cross-domain autofill dialog

content_cross_domain_dialog_description.message: This page includes login forms from domains different than the current website.
content_cross_domain_dialog_description.description: Description explaining why the cross-domain dialog is shown

content_cross_domain_dialog_domain_colum.description: Column header for domains in the cross-domain dialog table

content_cross_domain_dialog_behavior_col.description: Column header for autofill behavior in the cross-domain dialog table

content_cross_domain_dialog_always_ask.description: Dropdown option to always ask before autofilling on this domain

content_cross_domain_dialog_always_ask_d.message: Always ask to autofill on this page
content_cross_domain_dialog_always_ask_d.description: Description for the always ask dropdown option

content_cross_domain_dialog_always_autof.description: Dropdown option to always autofill on this domain without asking

content_cross_domain_dialog_always_autof.message: Allow autofill automatically on this page
content_cross_domain_dialog_always_autof.description: Description for the always autofill dropdown option

content_cross_domain_dialog_never_autofi.description: Dropdown option to never autofill on this domain
Description for the never autofill dropdown option

content_cross_domain_dialog_cancel.description: Cancel button text in the cross-domain dialog

content_cross_domain_dialog_accept.description: Accept button text in the cross-domain dialog
